title: Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio with a mini CMS blog, showcasing my projects, work history, and design style.
detailDescription: This portfolio website is built using React for the frontend and Java with Spring Boot for the backend. It features a mini CMS blog that allows me to easily add and manage blog posts. The site is styled with CSS to create a clean and modern look, and it's containerized using Docker for easy deployment. The portfolio showcases my various projects, work history, and design style, providing visitors with a comprehensive view of my skills and experience.

title: Widget Board
description: A webpage for using all my favorite widgets.
detailDescription: Widget Board is a personal project that serves as a centralized webpage for accessing all my favorite widgets. Built with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, the site provides a user-friendly interface for quickly accessing various tools and resources. Widget Board is designed to enhance productivity by bringing together essential widgets in one convenient location.
